atk-s0403a8:2_1: Catutthassa paṭhame rajanīyesūti rāgassa paccayesu ārammaṇesu. Sesesupi eseva nayo.
atk-s0403a8:6_5: Lābhena ca lābhaṁ nijigīsitāti lābhena lābhagavesako.
atk-s0403a8:8_1: Pañcame akkhamo hoti rūpānanti rūpārammaṇānaṁ anadhivāsako hoti,
atk-s0403a8:8_2: tadārammaṇehi rāgādīhi abhibhuyyati. Eseva nayo sabbattha.
atk-s0403a8:10_1: Chaṭṭhe atthapaṭisambhidāppattoti pañcasu atthesu pabhedagataṁ ñāṇaṁ patto.
atk-s0403a8:10_2: Dhammapaṭisambhidāppattoti catubbidhe dhamme pabhedagataṁ ñāṇaṁ patto.
atk-s0403a8:10_4: Paṭibhānapaṭisambhidāppattoti tesu tīsu ñāṇesu pabhedagataṁ ñāṇaṁ patto.
atk-s0403a8:10_5: So pana tāni tīṇi ñāṇāneva jānāti, na tesaṁ kiccaṁ karoti.
atk-s0403a8:14_2: Rattaññūti pabbajitadivasato paṭṭhāya atikkantānaṁ bahūnaṁ rattīnaṁ ñātā. Ñātoti paññāto pākaṭo. Yasassīti yasanissito.
atk-s0403a8:16_7: Yathāvimuttaṁ cittaṁ na paccavekkhatīti yathā yaṁ cittaṁ vimuttaṁ, ye ca dosā pahīnā, guṇā ca paṭiladdhā,
atk-s0403a8:16_8: te paccavekkhitvā upariguṇapaṭilābhāya vāyāmaṁ na karotīti attho.
atk-s0403a8:16_9: Iti imasmiṁ sutte sattannaṁ sekhānaṁ upariguṇehi parihānikāraṇañca vuddhikāraṇañca kathitaṁ.
atk-s0403a8:18_5: Atidivāti divā vuccati majjhanhiko, taṁ atikkamitvā.
atk-s0403a8:18_9: Santuṭṭhikathāti catūhi paccayehi santuṭṭhā hothāti kathanakathā.
atk-s0403a8:18_10: Pavivekakathāti tīhi vivekehi vivittā hothāti kathanakathā.
atk-s0403a8:18_11: Asaṁsaggakathāti pañcavidhena saṁsaggena asaṁsaṭṭhā hothāti kathanakathā.
atk-s0403a8:18_13: Sīlakathādīsu sīlaṁ ārabbha kathā sīlakathā. Samādhiṁ ārabbha, paññaṁ ārabbha,
atk-s0403a8:18_17: dukkhalābhī na vipulalābhīti attho. Sesaṁ uttānatthamevāti.
